tuv.seg: The European Council brings together the heads of state or government of every EU country,
Tugann an Chomhairle Eorpach cinn stáit nó rialtais i ngach tír san AE le chéile
Council of the European Union
Comhairle Aontas na hEorpa
The Council of the European Union consists of one government minister from every member state
Tá an Chomhairle Aontas na hEorpa comhdhéanta d'aon Aire Rialtais amháin de gach Ballstát
The Council is the main decision making body in the EU
Is é Comhairle an príomhchomhlacht cinnteoireachta san AE
This document discusses the powers of the European Commission
Tá cur síos sa cháipéis seo ar chumhachtaí Choimisiún na hEorpa
European Court of Justice
Cúirt Bhreithiúnais an Aontais Eorpaigh
The European Court of Justice ensures that European law is interpreted and applied in each member state
The European Court of Justice ensures that European law is interpreted and applied in each member state
Find out about the other important functions of this court
Find out about the other important functions of this court
The European Parliament represents about 502 million people in the 28 countries of the European Union
Is í Parlaimint na hEorpa an institiúid a dhéanann ionadaíocht níos mó ná 503 milliún saoránach sa 28 tír an Aontais Eorpaigh
Members of the European Parliament
Baill de Pharlaimint na hEorpa
There are a currently a total of 766 members of the European Parliament
I láthair na huaire tá 766 Feisire de chuid Pharlaimint na hEorpa (FPE) ann
Find out about the role and functions of members of the European Parliament (MEPs)
Tá cur síos sa cháipéis seo ar ról agus feidhmeanna Baill de Pharlaimint na hEorpa - Feisirí Eorpacha
European Parliament Political Groups
Grúpaí Polaitiúla Aontas na hEorpa
There are eight political groups in the European Parliament, representing a range of political views
Tá 8 gcinn de ghrúpaí polaitiúla i bParlaimint na hEorpa ag déanamh ionadaíocht ar raon dearcthaí polaitiúla
The main task of the European Court of Auditors, is auditing and overseeing the accounts and budgets of the institutions of the European Union
Tá sé mar phríomhdhualgas ag Cúirt na nIniúchóirí iniúchadh breathnú a dhéanamh ar chuntais agus na mbuiséad in institiúidí Aontas na hEorpa
The European Ombudsman safeguards the fundamental rights of citizens living in Europe by ensuring open and accountable administrations within the European Union
Breathnaíonn Ombudsman na hEorpa i ndiaidh bunchearta saoránach atá ina gcónaí san Eoraip a chosaint tríd córais riaracháin oscailte agus freagrach taobh istigh d'Aontas na hEorpa a chinntiú
Most Read in "Government in Ireland"
Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Rialtas in Éirinn"
Fundamental Rights under the Irish Constitution
Bunchearta faoi Bhunreacht na hÉireann
